sentences.en: "Is it safe?" — "Well of course it is."
sentences.cn: “安全吗？”——“当然啦。”

sentences.en: Don't worry, Uncle Tim, your future is safe in our hands.
sentences.cn: 别担心，蒂姆大叔，你将来由我们照顾。

sentences.en: Don'tworry, Mr Palin, your secret is safe with me.
sentences.cn: 别担心，佩林先生，我会保守你的秘密。

sentences.en: Eric Cantona made the game safe with a brilliant opportunist goal.
sentences.cn: 埃里克·坎通纳抓住机会踢进绝妙的一球，锁定了比赛的胜局。

sentences.en: He took Sabrina to one side and told her about the safe.
sentences.cn: 他将萨布丽娜拉到一旁，悄悄告诉她关于保险箱的事。

sentences.en: I couldn't remember ever having felt so safe and secure.
sentences.cn: 我从未有过如此安全的感觉。

sentences.en: Just play it safe, cover your ass, keep your head down.
sentences.cn: 要谨慎行事，保护好自己并保持低调。

sentences.en: Make sure you keep these documents safe .
sentences.cn: 你一定要妥善保管这些文件。

sentences.en: Mr Thomas would be given safe passage to and from Jaffna.
sentences.cn: 托马斯先生可以安全地往来于贾夫纳。

sentences.en: Our main objective was the recovery of the child safe and well.
sentences.cn: 我们的主要目标是将孩子安然无恙地找回来。

sentences.en: People must be satisfied that the treatment is safe.
sentences.cn: 人们必须确信这种治疗方法是安全的。

sentences.en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialised and safe since punk.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐自从朋克乐以后就已经过于商业化而缺乏新意了。

sentences.en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialized and safe since punk.
sentences.cn: 自朋克乐之后，摇滚乐已经变得太商业化、太保守了。

sentences.en: She doesn’t feel safe in the house on her own.
sentences.cn: 她独自一人在家感到不安全。

sentences.en: The community reacted quickly and spread the word about safe sex.
sentences.cn: 社区迅速作出反应，宣传安全性行为。

sentences.en: The files are now in a safe to which only he has the key.
sentences.cn: 那些文件如今在一个保险柜里，只有他有钥匙。

sentences.en: The nearest safe anchorage was in Halifax, Nova Scotia.
sentences.cn: 最近的安全泊地在新斯科舍省的哈利法克斯。

sentences.en: They stayed, safe and happy, within their own social milieu.
sentences.cn: 他们幸福无忧地呆在自己的社交圈子里。

sentences.en: they used to recruit hundreds a year, safe in the knowledge that many would leave.
sentences.cn: 他们过去一年招收数百人，因为他们知道很多人会离去。

sentences.en: to be on the safe side, she had recorded everything.
sentences.cn: 为稳妥起见，她把一切都记录下来。

words.tran_cn: 安全；保险；安全设备；保险装置；安打
安全的,保险的;没有危险的
[安全]保险箱；[制冷]冷藏室；纱橱

phrases.tran_cn: 对某人采取防范措施，使某人不能为害
安全设备，安全措施；安全护板；护轨
（用于表示因掌握了某种所说明的情况，做某事无风险或无需担忧）因了解…情况而做某事有把握
安全性行为（通常特别指利用避孕套来避免受爱滋病等传播）

phrases.phrase: to be on the safe side

trans.tran_cn: 安全的，不会受伤的，保险的，有把握的，缺乏新意的
trans.tran_en: not in danger of being harmed, lost, or stolen
a strong metal box or cupboard with special locks where you keep money and valuable things
